Package patrilex

Class Summary
ArabicLemmatizer Implements a lemmatizer for Arabic nouns
ArabicTokenizer Tokenizer for Arabic correctly processing diacritics.
ArabicVowelFilter Removes Arabic vowels from the input.
Constants Main class for managing the resources of the Patrilex search engine
ConstantsManager Class providing functions for managing the dictionary
DatabaseOperations Implements some basic functions for accessing the DB
Dictionary Class providing functionality for translation of one or multiple words
DictionaryImport Class providing import of csv-files containing dictionary information.
DictionaryManager Class providing functions for managing the dictionary
DisplayHelp Displays the help for the search
EnglishLemmatizer Implements a lemmatizer for English nouns
GermanLemmatizer  
IndexFilesWeb Class providing functions for managing the index.
IndexManager This class provides functions for managing the index.
InitializePatrilex Class for initializing the Patrilex Search Engine.
LemmaFilter Provides a filter that lemmatizes tokens
Lemmatizer Abstract class for lemmatizer implementations
MultilingAnalyzer Implements an analyzer where the language can be selected at initializing
PatrilexManager Main class for managing the resources of the Patrilex search engine
RussianLemmatizer Implements a lemmatizer for Russian nouns
SearchFilesWeb Main class providing the interface for search
SearchModule Class responsible for constructing a query and searching the index
SpanishLemmatizer Implements a lemmatizer for Spanish nouns
Thesaurus Class providing functions for the expansion of a query
ThesaurusImport Class providing import of a thesaurus.
ThesaurusManager Class providing functions for managing the dictionary
ThesaurusTranslation Class providing translation of a thesaurus to UNL.
UNLTokenizer  
Welcome Displays the help for the search
